text: José Luis Cuciuffo (1 February 1961 – 11 December 2004) was an Argentine footballer, defender in the 1986 FIFA World Cup-winning Argentine national team. He was a centre back who was often found upfield using his technique well. ==Club career== Cuciuffo started his professional career at Chaco For Ever, and later played for Talleres de Córdoba, Vélez Sársfield, Boca Juniors and Belgrano de Córdoba.
